enb_long_title: Ninth session of the IPCC Working Group III (WGIII)
sentences: IPCC Chair Rajendra Pachauri opened the 26th session of the IPCC on Friday, 4 May 2007.

Pungbun Na Ayudhya, Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment, Thailand, encouraged partnerships and collaboration to address climate change, and suggested that economic and social dimensions of mitigation and adaptation need to be better understood.
David Goodrich, WMO, said that IPCC AR4 findings are consistent with WMO findings on observed changes, and underscored the need for both adaptation and mitigation.
